summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney to an unknown recipient forwarding a potential lead regarding Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The lead originates from a private security contact of a NYPD Lieutenant's former colleague, who claims to have information and documents to share.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named alongside Jeffrey Epstein as a subject about whom a private security contact claims to have information and documents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named alongside Ghislaine Maxwell as a subject about whom a private security contact claims to have information and documents.

connections.description: Both are named together as subjects of a potential investigative lead regarding information and documents held by a private security contact.

events.title: Lead forwarded to FBI regarding Epstein/Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney forwards a potential lead to the FBI regarding information and documents on Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell held by a private security contact.

keyFacts: A private security contact, working for an unnamed individual with homes in New York, Florida, and the Bahamas, claims to possess information and documents regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
The lead was communicated to an Assistant United States Attorney by a person whose brother is a Lieutenant in the NYPD.
The Assistant United States Attorney states they will pass the lead on to the FBI for follow-up.
